-- | IRC plugins for lambdabot.

@package lambdabot-irc-plugins

module Lambdabot.Plugin.IRC
ircPlugin :: Module IRCState
localtimePlugin :: Module TimeMap
logPlugin :: Module (Map Channel ChanState)
topicPlugin :: Module ()
ircPlugins :: [String]
